content: *these beautiful love birds make perfect gifts for valentine s day lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80015ad * pdf modified february 2011 * skill level easy wool-ease® article #620 2 colors 1 ball each crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 6 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing some construction required to finish *free registration required on lion brand to obtain pattern *
